description: This file defines a function to write audit log entries into a database, including handling of optional parameters and error suppression.

methods.name: writeAuditLog({ userId, orgUserId, action, entityType, entityId, severity = 'info', message, ip, userAgent, requestId, metadata = {}, })
methods.description: Asynchronously writes an audit log entry to the database with provided details; errors are caught and suppressed.

ctags.name: writeAuditLog
ctags.signature: ({ userId, orgUserId, action, entityType, entityId, severity = 'info', message, ip, userAgent, requestId, metadata = {}, })
